participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is friendly and engaging, eager to connect with others. He often initiates conversations and shows concern when responses are delayed.
participant_1.background: i'm a male. i have a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is compassionate and community-oriented, with a cheerful demeanor. She enjoys helping others and is passionate about her work with animals.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
